name: part_013
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY1】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment hololive stage2 DAY1【チラ見せ】 [qBwpM98PXcI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Opening group performance of the Hololive 5th Fes. theme song 'Capture the Moment' by various Hololive members.
Transition segment leading into the solo performance.
Tokino Sora performs her solo song 'Slowly Runner' and greets the audience.

subtitles.original: だけが 見つめていたいんだよ
subtitles.english: I just want to keep watching

subtitles.original: 夢の色が変わっても 変わらないメロディに
subtitles.english: Even if the color of the dream changes, to the unchanging melody

subtitles.original: 君のために 僕らのために 歌おう
subtitles.english: For you, for us, let's sing

subtitles.original: 今を描き 君と僕らの奇跡は 終わらないよ
subtitles.english: Drawing the present, our miracle will never end

subtitles.original: 涙さえ きっかけに変えていこう
subtitles.english: Let's turn even our tears into a starting point

subtitles.original: 信じてくれる 仲間と一緒に
subtitles.english: Together with the comrades who believe in us

subtitles.original: どこへだって 飛び出していこう
subtitles.english: Let's fly out to anywhere

subtitles.original: もっと 遠く 空を越えて
subtitles.english: Further and further, beyond the sky

subtitles.original: 未来の僕らに まだ見ぬ君に
subtitles.english: To our future selves, to you whom we haven't seen yet

subtitles.original: 伝えたいこと たくさんあるんだ
subtitles.english: There are so many things I want to tell you

subtitles.original: 迎えたい今 当たり前なんかじゃない
subtitles.english: The present we want to welcome is not something to be taken for granted

subtitles.original: 翼を広げて さあ
subtitles.english: Spread your wings, now

subtitles.original: 歌おう
subtitles.english: Let's sing

subtitles.original: Take my hand 連れていくよ 光の真ん中
subtitles.english: Take my hand, I'll take you to the middle of the light

subtitles.original: 夢の先へ 羽ばたける
subtitles.english: We can flap our wings towards the end of our dreams

subtitles.original: 時は君の願い みんなで繋いだこの奇跡が
subtitles.english: Time is your wish, this miracle we all connected together

subtitles.original: 途切れないように歌うんだ
subtitles.english: I'll sing so that it never breaks off

subtitles.original: もっと 高く 大きな声で
subtitles.english: Higher and higher, with a louder voice

subtitles.original: 僕ら 扉 開けて
subtitles.english: We open the door

subtitles.original: どこまでも 響いていく メロディ
subtitles.english: The melody that resonates everywhere

subtitles.original: ゆっくり走れ 走れ 道に迷った時がチャンスだ
subtitles.english: Run slowly, run, the time you get lost is your chance

subtitles.original: みんな、今日は見に来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for coming to see me today!

subtitles.original: 目の前のことにがむしゃらで 間違いは数え切れなくて
subtitles.english: Frantically focused on what's in front of me, making countless mistakes

subtitles.original: 一つのことに手一杯で 足元しか見えてなくて
subtitles.english: Hands full with just one thing, only seeing my own feet

subtitles.original: 真っ直ぐ進むも キラキラした言葉も持たず
subtitles.english: Neither going straight ahead, nor having any sparkling words

subtitles.original: 止まらずに行こう 誓いに押されそう
subtitles.english: Let's go without stopping, seemingly pushed by a vow

subtitles.original: 忘れたくないよ ただ好きの気持ち 瞳の向こうの光を
subtitles.english: I don't want to forget, just the feeling of liking, the light beyond my eyes

subtitles.original: 気にするのはやめよう
subtitles.english: Let's stop worrying about it

subtitles.original: ゆっくり走れ 走れ 道に迷った時がチャンスだ
subtitles.english: Run slowly, run, the time you get lost is your chance

subtitles.original: 何もない 何もない 新しい僕が見つかるはずさ
subtitles.english: There's nothing, there's nothing, I'm sure I'll find a new me

subtitles.original: できないことばかり見えてくる いつも遠回り
subtitles.english: I only see things I can't do, always taking the long way around

subtitles.original: だけど昨日のようには 道が見えるなら大丈夫
subtitles.english: But if the path is visible like it was yesterday, it's okay

subtitles.original: 踏み出してしまった道は なかなか戻り辛くなって
subtitles.english: The path I've stepped onto has become hard to return from

subtitles.original: これも一つの経験だ たった一人の人生だ
subtitles.english: This too is an experience, it's my one and only life

subtitles.original: 分からないことは 分からないと言い出せない
subtitles.english: I can't bring myself to say I don't know the things I don't know

subtitles.original: 臆病な僕を みんなは責めなかった
subtitles.english: Everyone didn't blame me for being a coward

subtitles.original: 忘れたくないよ この僕の気持ち 誰かを演じてた
subtitles.english: I don't want to forget, these feelings of mine, I was playing someone else

subtitles.original: 嘘はもうやめよう
subtitles.english: Let's stop the lies now

subtitles.original: ゆっくり走れ 走れ 風が吹いたら進む証明だ
subtitles.english: Run slowly, run, it's proof that I move forward when the wind blows

subtitles.original: 何もない 何もない それよりも先は僕次第だから
subtitles.english: There's nothing, there's nothing, because beyond that is up to me

subtitles.original: できないことばかり見えてくる いつも遠回り
subtitles.english: I only see things I can't do, always taking the long way around

subtitles.original: だけど昨日のようには 道が見えるなら大丈夫
subtitles.english: But if the path is visible like it was yesterday, it's okay

subtitles.original: 盛り上がってるー！？
subtitles.english: Are you guys having fun!?

subtitles.original: なんと今年でフェスも5回目となります！
subtitles.english: Believe it or not, this is the 5th fes!
